price: 21. „Pakluskite tiems, kurie neprašo iš jūsų jokio atlygio (sau), ir kurie yra teisingai vedantys.“
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
